QuestData.Title: Times are Tough
QuestData.Description: Times are tough, $g brother:sister;. With the downtrodden masses of Stormwind migrating into Westfall, resources are stretched as thin as they've ever been. The people are restless and in need of help.$B$BOur own farmhouse has been serving as a halfway house for years. Salma does the best that she can to keep our guests alive, but sometimes the watchers get 'em. Watchers are those twisted abominations roaming my fields - a little present left behind by the Defias, before they were driven off. Help us!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $g brother:sister;. You've done Salma and I a great service and I promise that it won't soon be forgotten. I don't have much money, but you're welcome to what I do have.
